Name: Udjat-eye
Description: The udjat-eye is an open human eye with some extra elements added to it. The amulet is connected with the celestial deity in the shape of a falcon and therefore also with the king. It is one of the most popular amulets and was not just used in the funerary cult.This udjat-eye of light blue faience is a left eye. It has a pierced loop and the brow is painted black.
